overview: Alternadudes presents Occupy Ball Street. The "Occupy Movement" has stood for many things and has many followers. This is just a quick glance into the lives of some of the supporters of the Ball Street movement. This is a tale of what the protesters must endure with each other, in dealing with lawyers, and how to beat the police. So sit back and watch Thrasher get thrashed with a night stick from super hung stud and newly commissioned police officer, Cliff Jensen. See newcummer Kail Adams occupy the ass of fellow newcummers, shaggy Christian Blu and goth prince, Alaric, while the old law pro, Josh Bensan, does some occupying of his own.
title: Occupy Ball Street
